ESRS 2 paragraph 61 states in respect of policies and targets: ‘The minimum disclosure
requirements on policies and actions shall be located alongside disclosures prescribed by the
relevant ESRS. When a single policy or same actions address several interconnected sustainability
matters, the undertaking may disclose the required information in its reporting under one topical
ESRS and cross-reference to it in its reporting under other topical ESRS.’
